name: HEE-prototypes
description: Rapidly create HTML prototypes of NHS websites and services.

scripts.backstop:ref: docker-compose run backstopjs npm run backstop:ref
scripts.backstop:test: docker-compose run backstopjs npm run backstop:test
scripts.backstop:approve: docker-compose run backstopjs npm run backstop:approve
scripts.backstop:generate-config: docker-compose run backstopjs npm run backstop:generate-config
scripts.playwright:test: docker-compose run playwright npx playwright test --config ./tests/playwright/config/playwright.config.js

author: https://github.com/nhsuk/
